column7: 4 = Hill start aid off. Hill descent on
6 = Hill start aid on. Hill descent on
7 = Hill start aid on, Hill descent off
Remove sirius. decrease * by 2 values if A make it an 8, if 2 then make it 0
7 = Nav overide while moving (no more sirius travel link) 911 seems to still operate but haven't actually tested it
1 = Darkcar enabled (interior lights do not turn on when door is opened)
Daytime Running Lights uses Parklamps: 0=disable, 1=enable (Note: ALL park lamps will be on including tailights)
1 = Fog lights Enabled, no high beam use
2 = Fog lights Enabled with high beams
F0 = Basic remote start menus (climate heat/ac, front defrost, timeout, quiet start)
F2 = remote start menu + rear defrost
FE = remote start menus +rear defrost and heated/cooled seats
Front tire first two **. Rear tire second two **. 35psi=23 36psi=24 use decimal to hex converter to find other values for whatever psi you want
Tire Size Change the **** to your size. use calc to right (Hex code is tire circumference in mm)

column8: OUC=On until you manually cancel the turn signal

column1: Activate Compass in IPC if you have MFT
column7: 8 = compass menu in gauge menu available, no rear park menu
D = Reverse park aid menu available. compass available
4 = activates compass in IPC to actually work, no other changes needed. MFT compass still works
E = 2 speed auto 4x4 menu (4A transfer case needed)  compass works in IPC. MFT compass still works
